desc: Delivering the feeling of Fredericksburg Texas to people across the U.S. through gift boxes of the finest and most iconic products Fredericksburg Texas has to offer. Boxes include food, snacks, wine, beauty products, coffee, candles and gardening tools. Gift boxes are for birthdays, holidays and Mothers Day.

layout.text: Delivering the feeling of Fredericksburg Texas to your clients, family, and friends

Dearest Friends: We initially created this site to partner with some of our favorite companies in the Hill Country, to assist them during a once-in-a-lifetime pandemic. As we continue to see the light at the end of the tunnel we have determined our best mission moving forward is to offer peaches to our clients every summer and move away from the gift box business. We appreciate all the friends we have made during this unprecedented time and we look forward to serving you in the future with our exquisite peach offerings.
